title: Users
description: Cloud database collection storing WeChat user accounts for the enrollment mini program.

_id.description: Primary key matching the user's WeChat openid.

nick.description: Display nickname obtained from the user profile.

avatar.description: Avatar image URL bound to the WeChat account.

role.description: Authorization role for the enrollment mini program.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the account document was first created.

last_login_at.description: Timestamp of the most recent login activity.
